about_the_game:
Hermit and Pig is a turn-based, adventure RPG about an old man, a truffle pig, and a deadly mystery that has interrupted their peaceful life.

Time sensitive battles with button combo attacks!
Overcome anxiety while talking to NPCs!
ALSO: puzzles, mushroom foraging, and very amateur detective work!

short_description: Hermit and Pig is a turn-based, adventure RPG about a reclusive hermit and his truffle-hunting pig. These unlikely heroes must explore, forage, fight, and overcome unfortunate personal shortcomings to solve the mystery of a sinister corporate plot.
